scripts.setup:ptau: snarkjs powersoftau new bn128 18 build/pot18_0000.ptau -v && snarkjs powersoftau contribute build/pot18_0000.ptau build/pot18_0001.ptau --name='first' -v && snarkjs powersoftau prepare phase2 build/pot18_0001.ptau build/pot18_final.ptau -v
scripts.setup:zkey: snarkjs groth16 setup build/commit64_sha256.r1cs build/pot18_final.ptau build/commit64_0000.zkey && snarkjs zkey contribute build/commit64_0000.zkey build/commit64_final.zkey --name='p1' -v && snarkjs zkey export verificationkey build/commit64_final.zkey build/verification_key.json
scripts.verify: snarkjs groth16 verify build/verification_key.json build/public.json build/proof.json
